title: Neelavizhi Nilavai Lyrics Thulli Ezhunthathu Kadhal Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Rahul Nambiar, Shreya Ghoshal, Saindhavi
Song: Neelavizhi Nilavai
Lyrics : Yuga Bharathi

Movie: Thulli Ezhunthathu Kadhal
Music: BOBO Shashi

Neelavizhi nilavaai thiriya,
ninra idam malaraai viriya
maaruthalai naanum ariya,
enna idhu kaadhal sugama

Paona vali adada maraya,
punnagaiyil ulage uraiya
kaadhal ennai kaadhal puriya,
kan imaiyil anbe thangidava

Varavillai vaarthai ne sirithal
pala minnal thondruthu imaithal
kaanavillaye manam unanaye
unnai kaanbatharke athu senrathe

Mazhai ninridamale adithal
adhu rendu peraiyum ninaithal
Iravin payan onragume
Perugividum santhosame
Iruthivarai ellavume
iruvaradhu kai serume

Thalli irunthathe aavale
thannai maranthathu inruthaan
thulli ezhunthadhe kaadhale
thollai kodukuthe ninruthaan

Tholaindhu ponaho urakam
ennai vandhu serudhe kulappam
thevai illaiye kanvengiren
unnai nijamenru dan uyir ennuthe

Alavilla kadhalai koduthaai
adhai nenjil thaangudhu ninaithaal
imai irandum poovagume
naalai maranthu naal pogume
iru idhayam onragume
idaiveligal thoolaagume

Ivan uyirum un moochile, inaithirukume anbile
unadhuyirum en moochile ,kalandhirukume mannile

Paona vali adada maraya, punnagaiyil ulage uraiya
kaadhal ennai kaadhal puriya, kan imaiyil anbe thangidava

Neelavizhi nilavaai thiriya, ninra idam malaraai viriya
maaruthalai naanum ariya, enna idhu maayam seiyudhamma
